block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This crazy looking origami plane is the 36th Member of our 100 Exotic Paper airplane challenge. It is the Stealth Wing designed by Paul Jackson. It looks like 2 kites attached together. When thrown, It will flutter up like a bird like a bionic paper airplane. This plane was not made for distance, but it flies really cool. Enjoy! If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 035 : Elephant Plane by Ashley Wood", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/UV7qz0qyMQ0 Stealth Wing by Paul Jackson Tutorial Timeline: 0:00 Flight Test 0:06 Demonstration 0:14 Start Folding 0:30 Divide Base in Three 1:10 Folding the Kite Wings 1:35 Folding the Nose of the Paper Airplane 2:34 Joining the Wings of the Paper Airplane 3:35 Folding the Plane in Half Airplane 3:42 How to Throw 4:27 Fly me one more time Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
